dcterms:creator: Wenjing Meng
Deqing Yang
Yanghua Xiao
dcterms:description: This dataset contains user session data extracted from an e-commerce search engine logs that can be used to build session-based recommender systems. The dataset is preprocessed to filter out items that appear less than 5 times and incorporates side information like the category of the product to improve performance.
dcterms:title: Diginetica

dcterms:creator: Priyanka Gupta
Diksha Garg
Pankaj Malhotra
Lovekesh Vig
Gautam Shroff
dcterms:description: This dataset contains <user, timestamp, artist, song> tuples collected from Last.FM API, representing the listening habits of nearly 1,000 users. It is primarily used for baseline evaluations as it does not contain sufficient side information.
dcterms:title: Last.FM

dcterms:creator: Pengjie Ren
Zhumin Chen
Jing Li
Zhaochun Ren
Jun Ma
Maarten Rijke
dcterms:description: This dataset is a popular movie rating dataset that includes user ID, item ID, timestamp, and rating. It also contains features like genres of movies, which can be used to train embeddings for movies.
dcterms:title: MovieLens

dcterms:creator: Shu Wu
Yuyuan Tang
Yanqiao Zhu
Liang Wang
Xing Xie
Tieniu Tan
dcterms:description: This dataset contains transaction data from a Chinese grocery store, including features such as transaction_date, customer_id, product_id, and product_subclass. It is used to improve performance in session-based recommendations by utilizing product subclass as side information.
dcterms:title: Ta Feng
